name: Flying Staff
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
text: The staff is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the staff must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the staff remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal staff.

action.name: Knife
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
